From what I've seen, perhaps we should have police and stuff guarding the area. I mean, as Christians who believe that it's okay to hate, to kill and rape in the name of their God, I think it would only be the safe thing to do.
 
 If they are trying to recruit, I don't think that this kind of hate and intolerance will go over very well with potential converts either.

 I don't think I will ever change the way we look to most people - especially when we're all thrown in the same basket.
 
 But there are Christians that would rather fight the problems of the world than attack the people. I'm one of them. I have seen enough evidence to say without a doubt that we are not fighting against flesh and blood, but against principalities and supernatural powers, belonging to the evil of this world.
